bombbot.title: Bombbot
bombbot.description: This robot sits quietly in front of a wall of defused bombs. A calm after the storm, captured in stylized 2D.

anubis.title: Temple of Anubis
anubis.description: The Temple of Anubis is a sacred and mysterious structure modeled in 3D, inspired by Egyptian mythology.

lola-trip.title: Lola's Trip
lola-trip.description: Lola embarks on a colorful, stylized journey through vibrant space.

martha.title: Martha
martha.description: Martha da Singer is a 2D tribute to classic soul and jazz, painted with love and rhythm.

orb.title: The Orb of Wisdom
orb.description: The Orb of Wisdom glows with mystic light. A 3D art piece capturing intellect and magic.

factory.title: The Factory
factory.description: The Orb of Wisdom glows with mystic light. A 3D art piece capturing intellect and magic.

lola-sun.title: Lola's trip
lola-sun.description: Lola bathing in golden sunlight. A 3D character moment filled with warmth.

orientdevil.title: The Orient Devil
orientdevil.description: With the inspiration of the Japanese's mask, I painted this many years ago when I first got my ipad.

vaping.title: Too Much Vaping
vaping.description: The flavors are so good! But just stop! It is not really good for you!

cupid.title: It's Cupid
cupid.description: Cupid is power by Tinder! Here for your love!

mitom.title: Mi Tom
mitom.description: Mi Tom is hot and ready!
